title: MetaMCP Namespaces
description: Group your MCP servers into namespaces and get ready to host with a single unified MCP Server endpoint for the namespace
createNamespaceDescription: Create a new namespace and select MCP servers to include
name: Name
selectServersDescription: Choose which MCP servers to include in this namespace
createFirstNamespace: Create your first namespace to get started
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this namespace?
deleteConfirmation: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the namespace and remove all associated data.
noMcpServersAvailable: No MCP servers available. Create some servers first.
selectMcpServersDescription: Select MCP servers to include in this namespace. You can modify this later.
deleteNamespaceDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will remove the namespace and all its MCP server associations. This action cannot be undone.
